name: NORTH (itch)
description:
Apply for asylum in a city filled with strange creatures.

WASD or Arrows to move / Mouse click to interact

...

If you encountered any bugs or just want to tell us what you think, don't hesitate to contact us: outlands.games@gmail.com.

You can also play our other games or follow our future projects on our website.

  • NORTH is free but any donations are welcome, here or on patreon
  • For 3$ you can buy the soundtrack (8 songs). 50% of the payments will be equally split and donated to Refugees On Rails and Refugee Open Ware.
